Feature Notes:
Concealment: Undetectable non-magically in guarded lands
Druid's Knowledge: Identify plant and animal types, determine water purity
Guarded Lands: Must select geography to protect and spend half time there
Live Off The Land: Needs no food or water while in guarded lands
Wilderness Movement: Normal, untrackable move through undergrowth
